General.Name: Nanjing OLO Home Furnishing
General.Description: Nanjing OLO Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd engages in the design, research and development, production, sale, and service of furniture products in China. It offers kitchen cabinets, door walls, and full house furniture. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 218, Qingshuiting West Road, Nanjing, China, 211100
